Embedding Python in C/C++
===========================

Useful starting point
-----------------------

* http://stackoverflow.com/questions/49137/calling-python-from-a-c-program-for-distribution


Embedding Python in C/C++

* http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/11805/Embedding-Python-in-C-C-Part-I
* http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/11843/Embedding-Python-in-C-C-Part-II

Embedding Python in Multi-Threaded C/C++ Applications

* http://www.linuxjournal.com/article/3641


Embedding Python with Boost.Python 

* http://members.gamedev.net/sicrane/articles/EmbeddingPythonPart1.html
